rules_text:
Foreshadow 3–{2}{B}{B} [i](If you cast this spell for its foreshadow cost, it enters with three time counters on it. Until the last is removed, it’s an artifact and not a creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it.)[/i]
When Rider of Ill Omen enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices two creatures.
